评论概述: Decent Shirt, But Could Be Better
评论详情: The design on this Y2K Berserk anime shirt is great—the graphic is vibrant and definitely stands out. It’s a cool piece for fans of the series and has that vintage vibe that fits the Y2K style.  However, the material is thinner than I expected, and the fit is a bit off. It runs a little smaller than standard sizing, so keep that in mind when ordering. It’s fine for casual wear, but I’d have liked better quality for the price. Overall, it’s an okay shirt if you’re mainly interested in the design, but don’t expect top-notch fabric or durability.
The size should have fit loosely in the body, but it was so short, it barely reached the top of his jeans. Returned.
GREAT quality but does run small so get a higher size then the usual. Stay Fresh Everyone 🤙🏽

I really like this shirt, it's tight at first but it can be stretched without ripping as long as you don't stretch it too hard of course. Fabric is comfortable, the decal is nice.. air dry and cold wash will help keep the decal from drying up and cracking.

Got this for myself 🥰 the design is beautiful and the material is super comfy. I got an XXL for like a pump cover and to use around the house or when I wanna be comfy. I will say it fits more like an XL, so not as baggy as I wanted, but still the size was flattering. So if you wanted it to fit closer to your actual size I’d recommend a size up! Definitely will be getting other designs from them in the future 🖤

评论概述: Struggle on strugglers - Guts in his Berserker armor
评论详情: Visually striking shirt with red and black themed Berserk decal on a distressed fabric tee. (Depicts Guts in the Berserker armor wielding the Dragon Slayer).  Speaking of Dragon Slayer... "It was too big to be called a decal. Massive, thick, heavy, and far too rough...."  The decal is large and thick (which makes it feel sort of plastic-y so if you have a spouse that's triggered by textures it may be off putting but I didn't find it too bad myself). I do wish the image was more detailed like the manga panel it's inspired from but Miura was known for crazy amounts of detail, whereas this is more reminiscent of a stencil type design but I don't know if that's more of a limitation to this type of t-shirt printing.  Overall happy with the shirt and will probably buy others from the set.
At the beginning when I got it the quality was horrible but once you wash it the plastic feeling goes away and it ends up looking nice and feeling comfortable to wear.
Shirt fits great they had sent the wrong size but I kept it anyways cause it fit great as pump cover

This vastly disappointing excuse of a graphic tee showed up at my door today.  First off the designer destroyed the original image by digitally retracing it with Generative Ai, just to scale it up to a less than desirable size.  Secondly, as if the eye sore wasn't bad enough it was heat transfered on crooked.

评论概述: Good fabric quality and vibrant graphics

This shirt is great quality!!

I wasn’t expecting the art on the shirt to be AI. You can’t make out any of the words and they’re just a jumbled AI mess in both English and Japanese (they’re clear in the listing photo). Guts has a second small eye on the bridge of his nose, there’s a weird floating hand next to his nose, you can’t make out the Guts in the middle holding the sword at all, Griffith’s face is an AI disaster, and Casca’s face is also super wonky due to the bad AI (she has no nose or defined mouth). I feel like the photo gives it too much credit, it is SO bad in person. Definitely skip this design.  Will say, the shirt itself feels like good quality and looks like a normal size! I may try a different design from this seller.
YES, heavy quality cotton, doesn't shrink very much AT ALL, and COMFORTABLE! Logo seems tough, even if it gets worn that's the style.
